name: Lazer Feds
overview: LAZER FEDS challenges you to become a Federal Space Agent with the mission to destroy all the enemy missile launchers on a hostile planet before they eliminate your fleet! Many of the traps they set include space mines and heat-seeking missiles. 99 increasingly difficult levels with scores up to 100 million mean your challenge is a great one! Blast off with your joystick in hand and be prepared to fire your laser cannons as often as you blink! Program includes two different games.
